resources.string: Look, we really need your location because bla bla bla…
Oops - you seem to have disabled location services at the moment. This app is really cool and needs your location because bla bla bla. To continue, please click on "OK".

Oops - you seem to have disabled location services at the moment. This app is really cool and needs your location because bla bla bla. To continue, please click on "OK" and enable location. If you\'re worried about battery usage, be sure to switch to energy saving mode.
Bummer! You have permanently declined the location permission. But this app is so cool and needs your location because… you know. Click "OK" to change the permission settings.
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'.
Location permission is required for this demo.
Unable to pick file. Check status of file manager.
